Create a virtual reality experience where users can simulate owning a self-driving car and experience the thrill of driving without any limitations.
Develop a mobile app that allows users to remotely control their self-driving car from their smartphones, providing them with real-time updates on the car's location and status.
Create a smart home integration system that uses voice commands to control the self-driving car, allowing users to park, charge, and schedule pickups without leaving their homes.
Develop a self-driving car rental service that uses blockchain technology to securely manage the rental process and ensure that the car is always in good condition.
Create a virtual assistant that uses natural language processing to help users find information about self-driving cars, including pricing, features, and reviews.
